    Program Changes and Updates

    The online catalog is updated as program and requirement changes are approved. If the same program is revised more than once, the new requirements replace previous requirements. All of the links below refer users to the current requirements.

    Spring 2021

    College of Applied Health Sciences

    • Establish a Minor in Food Science

    ​College of Business Administration

    • Rename and Revise the Concentration in Marketing Research; Revise the Concentration in Sales and Leadership; Rename and Revise the Concentration in Innovation and Product Management; Establish the Concentration in Retail and Services Marketing in the BS in Marketing
    • Revise the BS in Management, Establish the Concentration in Management Consulting, and Eliminate the Concentration in Strategic Management, Rename the Concentration in Leadership and Managerial Skills
    • Rename and Revise the Minor in Managerial Skills

    College of Engineering

    • Revise the Technical Electives Requirement in the Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering

    • Revise the BS in Engineering Physics

    College of Liberal Arts and Sciences

    • Revise the BS in the Teaching of Mathematics

    College of Urban Planning and Public Affairs

    • Establish a Minor in Civic Analytics
    • Establish a Minor in Nonprofit Management
    • Establish the Joint BA in Public Policy/Master of Public Policy, the Joint BA in Public Policy/Master of Urban Planning and Policy, and the Joint BA in Public Policy/MS in Civic Analytics
    • Establish the Joint BA in Urban Studies/Master of Public Administration, the Joint BA in Urban Studies/Master of Public Policy, and the Joint BA in Urban Studies/MS in Civic Analytics

    Spring 2020

    • Revise the Enrollment Residence Requirement for Undergraduate Degrees

    College of Applied Health Sciences

    • Revise the Minor in Nutrition

    College of Architecture, Design, and the Arts

    • Revise the BDes in Graphic Design and the BDes in Industrial Design
    • Revise the BA in Liberal Arts and Sciences, Major in Anthropology
    • Revise the BS in Liberal Arts and Sciences, Major in Integrated Health Studies
    • Revise the BA in Liberal Arts and Sciences, Major in Sociology

    College of Business Administration

    • Revise the BS in Accounting

    College of Liberal Arts and Sciences

    • Establish the Undergraduate Campus Certificate in Polish Language
    • Establish the Undergraduate Campus Certificate in Russian Language

    College of Urban Planning and Policy

    • Revise the Minor in Geographic Information Systems
    • Revise the Minor in Sustainable Cities
    • Revise the Minor in Urban Studies

    Summer 2020

    College of Liberal Arts and Sciences

    • Revise the BA in Liberal Arts and Sciences, Major in Psychology, General Psychology Concentration and BA in Liberal Arts and Sciences, Major in Psychology, Applied Psychology Concentration
    • Establish the Undergraduate Campus Certificate in Medical Humanities

    ​Fall 2020

    College of Applied Health Sciences

    • Establish a Required First-Year Seminar in the College of Applied Health Sciences
    • Revise the BS in Disability and Human Development
    • Revise the BS in Nutrition, Coordinated Program Concentration and the BS in Nutrition, Nutrition Science Concentration
    • Revise the Minor in Nutrition
    • Revise the Minor in Life Science Visualization
    • Revise the Minor in Kinesiology
    • Revise the Bachelor of Science in Kinesiology and Eliminate the Concentration in Exercise Science and Health Promotion and Concentration in Movement Science
    • Revise the BA in Architectural Studies

    College of Architecture, Design, and the Arts

    • Revise the Minor in Art
    • Revise the BFA in Acting
    • Revise the BA in Theatre and Performance
    • Revise the BA in Theatre Design, Production, and Technology
    • Revise the BA in Interdisciplinary Education in the Arts

    College of Business Administration

    • Revise the BS in Marketing
    • Revise the BS in Finance
    • Establish the Department of Marketing

    College of Engineering

    • Revise the BS in Civil Engineering
    • Revise the BS in Chemical Engineering

    College of Liberal Arts and Sciences

    • Revise the BS in Liberal Arts and Sciences, Major in Latin American and Latino Studies
    • Revise the Minor in Latin American and Latino Studies
    • Revise the BA in Liberal Arts and Sciences, Major in Political Science
    • Revise the Minor in Political Science
    • Revise the Minor in Communication
    • Revise the BA in Liberal Arts and Sciences, Major in Economics
    • Revise the Minor in Linguistics
    • Rename the Department of African American Studies 
    • Rename the Bachelor of Arts in Liberal Arts and Sciences, Major in African American Studies and Rename the Minor in African American Studies
    • Establish the Undergraduate Campus Certificate in German Language
    • Revise the BA in Liberal Arts and Sciences, Major in English, and Consolidate  and Revise the Concentration in British and Anglophone Literature and Concentration in American Literature
    • Establish the BS in Computer Science and Linguistics
    • Redesignate and Reorganize the Bachelor of Arts in Liberal Arts and Sciences, Major in Psychology, Concentration in General Psychology as the BS in Liberal Arts and Sciences with a Major in Psychology, and Rename and Reorganize the Bachelor of Arts in Liberal Arts and Sciences, Major in Psychology, Concentration in Applied Psychology as the BA in Liberal Arts and Sciences with a Major in Applied Psychology
    • Revise the Bachelor of Arts in the Teaching of History

    School of Public Health

    • Establish the BS in Public Health
